rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Avaritia Trade Guild seem very
prosperous these days.

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Is good to see Guild do well even
with no Chairman Bahn.

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Once friends finished helping Avaritia
prosper, maybe next should think about
becoming owner of shops.

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Complete missions, increase shop
lineup, then buy all available product!

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Only then do friends earn right to
buy shop itself.

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Friends should try to become number
one shop owner in all of Avaritia!
